name: Cataclysm (Austinl352)
description:
Cataclysm is a first-person shooter in an underground dungeon where the player shoots his way through to escape various unique enemies and with upgradeable weapons and unlockable skills.

Credits:

Rise Do : Abilities and Workshop functionality, Lead programmer for UI and spawn scripting.

On Lam : Map design and creation, Additional gun script programmer.

Austin Leskin : Enemy logic and scripting, Enemy animation and enemy sfx.

Cayo Syllos : Main player scripting, First person camera logic.
